resources.string: These are apps you have added in order to open them with voice operation detection. If you delete an app , it will not be recognized anymore with voice operations unless you add it again.

If voice assistant could not open an app because of poor recognition, you can add it by choosing an app from the list below and record an appropriate name. It is OK if the voice assistant gave a result with spelling mistakes. Try to record several times and choose the best result (the result you have seen the most).
App not found,you can add it to the list.

In order to open apps with voice operations ,first, you need to say the word open and then the name of the app you want to open , for example : open Calculator. If Voice Assistant could not open an app because of poor recognition, you can add it by clicking the floating button on your screen and then, click on the settings button.
